titleStmt.title: A godly and learned treatise of prayer which both conteineth in it the doctrine of prayer, and also sheweth the practice of it in the exposition of the Lords prayer: by that faithfull and painfull servant of God George Downame, Doctr of Divinity, and late L. Bishop of Dery in the realm of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.

titleStmt.title: A godly and learned treatise of prayer which both conteineth in it the doctrine of prayer, and also sheweth the practice of it in the exposition of the Lords prayer: by that faithfull and painfull servant of God George Downame, Doctr of Divinity, and late L. Bishop of Dery in the realm of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.
Downame, John, d. 1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Roger Daniel for Nicolas Bourn; and are to be sold at his shop at the south-entrance into the Royall Exchange in London,

notesStmt.note: "The doctrine of prayer" and "A godly and fruitfull exposition of the Lords prayer" each have separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
